## Forms class names using BEM

`v4 - Design System`

This form `class names` are brand new a follow Design System conventions.

`@deprecated`:  Although `form-v4` uses old @mixins compatible with Alice,
these will be removed in feature versions, as Alice migration from `v0,v3` to
`v4` progresses.

<fieldset>
  <legend class="inline-title">Dropdown <code>v4</code></legend>

  ### Drop Down
  ---
  
The drop down item has different styles per state <code>[initial, selected, invalid, selected]</code> 
  
  <div class="dropdown-demo" id="dropdown-demo">
      <label class="form__label">Size</label>
      <div class="form__dropdown">
          <button type="button" class="form__dropdown__button">Item 1</button>
        <ul class="form__dropdown__options" style="display: block;">
          <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--header">
            <span class="inline-title"> Pick an item</span>
          </li>
          <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--disclaimer">
            <span>The item cannot be returned</span>
          </li>
          <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--selected">Item 1 - selected </li>
          <li class="form__dropdown__item">Item 2</li>
          <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--disabled">Item 3 - disabled</li>
          <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--invalid">Item 4 - invalid</li>
        </ul>
      </div>
   </div>
  
  <small>*Note that this markup will only provide styling, not any functions</small>
  ```html
  <label class="form__label">Size</label>
  <div class="form__dropdown">
    <button type="button" class="form__dropdown__button">Item 1</button>
    <ul class="form__dropdown__options">
      <!-- Header with an icon arrow to be back on mobile -->
      <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--header">
        <span class="inline-title">Pick an item</span>
      </li>
      <!-- Placeholder for the disclaimer message -->  
      <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--disclaimer">
        <span>The item cannot be returned</span>
      </li>
      <!-- Selected Item  -->           
      <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--selected">Item 1 - selected</li>
      <!-- Initial Item -->        
      <li class="form__dropdown__item">Item 2</li>
      <!-- Disabled Item -->   
      <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--disabled">Item 3 - disabled</li>
      <!-- Invalid Item -->         
      <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--invalid">Item 4 - invalid</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
   ```

   ### Dropdown Button disabled
   ---
   
   Add <code>disabled</code> attribute or attach a class called <code>.form__dropdown__button--disabled</code> to the button.
    
   <label class="form__label">Size</label>
   <div class="form__dropdown">
      <button type="button" class="form__dropdown__button" disabled>Item 1</button>
      <ul class="form__dropdown__options">
        <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--header">
          <span class="inline-title">Pick an item</span>
        </li>
        <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--disclaimer">
          <span>The item cannot be returned</span>
        </li>
        <li class="form__dropdown__item form__dropdown__item--selected">Item 1 - selected </li>
        <li class="form__dropdown__item">Item 2</li>
        <li class="form__dropdown__item">Item 3</li>
        <li class="form__dropdown__item">Item 4</li>
      </ul>
   </div>

  ```html

     <label class="form__label">Size</label>
     <div class="form__dropdown">
       <button type="button" class="form__dropdown__button" disabled>Item 1</button>
       <ul class="form__dropdown__options">
          ....
       </ul>
     </div>
     
  ```
</fieldset>
